title: Waiting to laugh

abstract: 'I have many things I always wanted. That's why I have a big smile on my face.'
description: Now settled in Australia, Afghani born Hamid reflects on the difficult and lonely times he and his sister experienced when they moved to Iran after their mother's unexpected disappearance and their father's death one year later.
